statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, revenue FROM FinancialRecords WHERE expenses < 1000
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords WHERE waste_to_energy_category = 'Plastic'
SELECT date, expenses, revenue FROM FinancialRecords WHERE expenses > revenue
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords WHERE revenue < 5000 AND waste_to_energy_category IS NOT NULL ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT revenue, expenses FROM FinancialRecords WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM FinancialRecords WHERE waste_to_energy_category = 'Organic';
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT date, revenue, expenses, waste_to_energy_category FROM FinancialRecords WHERE expenses > 10000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_records;
SELECT id, amount FROM expense_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT date, amount FROM revenue_records ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, date FROM expense_records WHERE id >= 10 AND id < 20 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM expense_records WHERE amount < 500 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_records ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, amount FROM expense_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date
SELECT id, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_records GROUP BY id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT id, amount, date FROM revenue_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM expense_records WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM Revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT revenue_id, amount, date FROM Revenue WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Expenses ORDER BY expense_id ASC;
SELECT date, amount FROM FinancialRecords WHERE type='income' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT record_id, type, description FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM Revenue ORDER BY amount DESC, date DESC
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue WHERE date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT record_id, description FROM FinancialRecords WHERE type = 'income' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT expense_id, amount, DATE_FORMAT(date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT record_id, amount, type FROM FinancialRecords WHERE description LIKE '%salary%'
SELECT * FROM Revenue;
SELECT amount, date FROM Expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteToEnergyOperations WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT record_id, description, amount, record_date FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT description, amount FROM FinancialRecords WHERE description LIKE '%expense%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Revenue WHERE revenue_id = 1;
SELECT amount, date FROM Expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteToEnergyOperations WHERE operation_id > 100 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount >= 5000 AND record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT description, amount FROM FinancialRecords WHERE description LIKE '%operating%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Revenue;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name FROM ExpenseCategory ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT date, amount FROM Revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT plant_name, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Revenue ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT r.id, r.date, r.amount, rc.category_name FROM Revenue r JOIN RevenueCategory rc ON r.id = rc.id WHERE r.amount > 1000 AND rc.category_name = 'Income' ORDER BY r.amount DESC;

SELECT r.date, e.amount, et.plant_name FROM Revenue r INNER JOIN Expenses e ON r.date = e.date INNER JOIN WasteToEnergyPlant et ON e.id = et.id WHERE r.amount > e.amount AND e.amount < 500 ORDER BY r.date ASC, e.amount DESC;

SELECT e.date, SUM(r.amount) AS total_revenue, SUM(e.amount) AS total_expense FROM Expenses e LEFT JOIN Revenue r ON e.date = r.date GROUP BY e.date HAVING total_revenue > total_expense ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT e.date, ec.category_name, SUM(e.amount) AS total_expense FROM Expenses e JOIN ExpenseCategory ec ON e.id = ec.id GROUP BY e.date, ec.category_name HAVING total_expense > 500 ORDER BY e.date ASC, total_expense DESC;
